thread.title: Curtis Stone: celebrity chef adds cruising to foodie agenda | DailyTelegraph
thread.title_full: Curtis Stone: celebrity chef adds cruising to foodie agenda | DailyTelegraph

author: MELISSA HOYER
title: Curtis Stone: celebrity chef adds cruising to foodie agenda | DailyTelegraph
text:
AUSTRALIANS will finally be able to enjoy Curtis Stone’s cuisine close to home thanks to his recently announced partnership with Princess Cruises.
The conscious cruise coupling will see culinary offerings designed by Curtis served across the 18-ship fleet.
“There are three main things we are doing,” says Curtis, who landed in from his Los Angeles home today.
Celebrity chef Curtis Stone aboard the Diamond Princess at the Overseas Passenger Terminal, Circular Quay. Photo: Bob Barker.
Cool, crisp and understated: many cruising restaurants have totally changed from the way they used to be
The look of ‘Share’: the new Curtis Stone culinary experience, soon on board Princess Cruises
Curtis Stone on the deck of the Diamond Princess with Melissa Hoyer
Celebrity chef Curtis Stone aboard the Diamond Princess at the Overseas Passenger Terminal, Circular Quay as the start of the Australian summer cruise season commences. Photo: Bob Barker.
